name: simple-dijs
description: Simple Javascript Dependency Injection Container (DI) like Pimple

scripts.test: bash -c 'node_modules/jshint/bin/jshint di.js test/di.js' && bash -c 'node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha' && bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/jsdoc di.js -t node_modules/docdash/ -d api_doc' && bash -c 'node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle toplevel -o di.min.js -- di.js'

author: Aubin VIGHIER
